languages.text: {n}Кибелла издает горький смешок.{/n} "Вместе? Тебе неведомо, как непокорные мысли и чувства туманят внутренний взор. Твой мир... полон сиюминутных страстей. Он сплетен из них. Живет ими, не заботясь ни о каких стезях".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла издает горький смешок.{/n} "Вместе? Боюсь, тебе неведомо, как непокорные мысли и чувства способны затуманить внутренний взор. Твой мир... он полон сиюминутных страстей. Сплетен из них. Живет ими, не заботясь ни о каких стезях".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла издает горький смешок.{/n} "Вместе? Тебе неведомо, как непокорные мысли и чувства туманят внутренний взор. Твой мир... полон сиюминутных страстей. Он сплетен из них. Живет ими, не заботясь ни о каких стезях".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about my way or any other."

It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any way other than your own, including mine."

It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any way other than your own, including mine."

{n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."

{n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lacht verbittert.{/n} "Wie bitte? Ihr habt keine Ahnung, wie es ist, wenn fehlgeleitete Gedanken und Gefühle die innere Sicht verschleiern. Eure Welt ist ... voll vergänglicher Leidenschaften. Sie ist daraus gewoben. Sie lebt durch sie, ohne sich um einen anderen Faden als den Euren kümmern zu müssen, auch nicht um meinen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lacht verbittert.{/n} "Wie bitte? Ihr habt keine Ahnung, wie es ist, wenn fehlgeleitete Gedanken und Gefühle die innere Sicht verschleiern. Eure Welt ist ... voll vergänglicher Leidenschaften. Sie ist daraus gewoben. Sie lebt durch sie, ohne sich um einen anderen Faden als den Euren kümmern zu müssen, auch nicht um meinen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah deja escapar una risa amarga.{/n} «¿Junt{mf|o|a}s? No puede comprender lo que es que pensamientos y emociones errantes oscurezcan su visión interna. Su mundo está... lleno de pasiones transitorias. Está tejido a partir de ellas. Vive a través de ellas, sin tener que preocuparse por ningún hilo más que el suyo, ni siquiera el mío».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah deja escapar una risa amarga.{/n} «¿Junt{mf|o|a}s? No puede comprender lo que es que pensamientos y emociones errantes oscurezcan su visión interna. Su mundo está... lleno de pasiones transitorias. Está tejido a partir de ellas. Vive a través de ellas, sin tener que preocuparse por ningún hilo más que el suyo, ni siquiera el mío».

languages.text: {n}キベラは苦い笑い声をあげる。{/n}「一緒ですって？間違った考えや感情で自分の内面が見えなくなるというのがどういうことか、あなたにはわからないのね。あなたの世界は…一時的な情熱に満たされているわ。そういうもので織られている。私自身を含め、あなた自身の糸以外を気にすることなく、そういう中で生きているの」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは苦い笑い声をあげる。{/n}「一緒ですって？間違った考えや感情で自分の内面が見えなくなるというのがどういうことか、あなたにはわからないのね。あなたの世界は…一時的な情熱に満たされているわ。そういうもので織られている。私自身を含め、あなた自身の糸以外を気にすることなく、そういう中で生きているの」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈发出一声苦笑。{/n}“一起面对？你根本不明白，当你内心被错误的想法与情绪彻底填满时，那会是什么样的感觉。你的世界……充满了短暂的激情，你的世界由它们编织而成，通过它们运作。你只需要关注你自己的丝线就好了，不必关注其他丝线，就算是对我也无需例外。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈发出一声苦笑。{/n}“一起面对？你根本不明白，当你内心被错误的想法与情绪彻底填满时，那会是什么样的感觉。你的世界……充满了短暂的激情，你的世界由它们编织而成，通过它们运作。你只需要关注你自己的丝线就好了，不必关注其他丝线，就算是对我也无需例外。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah laisse échapper un rire amer.{/n} « Ensemble ? Vous n'avez aucune idée de ce que c'est que de voir son troisième œil occulté par des pensées et émotions fugitives. Votre monde est... tissé de passions éphémères. Vous ne vous souciez nullement du fil suivi par les autres... y compris du mien. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah laisse échapper un rire amer.{/n} « Ensemble ? Vous n'avez aucune idée de ce que c'est que de voir son troisième œil occulté par des pensées et émotions fugitives. Votre monde est... tissé de passions éphémères. Vous ne vous souciez nullement du fil suivi par les autres... y compris du mien. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, buruk bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Birlikte mi? Boş düşüncelerin ve duyguların içgörünü nasıl da gölgeleyebileceğine dair hiçbir fikrin yok. Senin dünyan... Gelip geçici tutkularla dolu. Onlarla örülmüş, onlarla iç içe varlığını sürdürüyor. Kendininki dışında hiçbir ipliği önemsemeden yaşıyorsun. Bunlara benimki de dâhil."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lets out a bitter chuckle.{/n} "Together? You have no notion of what it's like when errant thoughts and emotions obscure your inner sight. Your world is... full of transitory passions. It is woven from them. It lives through them, without having to care about any thread other than your own, including mine."
